definition: location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 區位理論是現代經濟地理學基本理論的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The future variety trend of land use is analyzed applying location quotient.
sentences.chinese: 並應用區位商數分析了未來土地利用方式的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: 'Location and traffic network' shows 3 stations in the town center. Please clarify.
sentences.chinese: 交通區位圖裏表示了城鎮中心有3個站點，請說明。

sentences.english: Sandu'Ao has preponderance on geographical location and has centuries-old history and relic.
sentences.chinese: 三都澳區位優越，具有悠久的歷史及遺存。

sentences.english: Fangchenggang is a city of advantageous situation with abundant shore tourism resources.
sentences.chinese: 防城港市區位優勢顯著，濱海旅遊資源豐富。

sentences.english: Dongguang County Transportation District, obvious advantages.
sentences.chinese: 東光縣交通區位優勢明顯。

sentences.english: Renshou County has obvious location advantages.
Analysis of industrial location factor is the key point to decide the allocation of industry.
sentences.chinese: 區位因子分析是確定工業佈局的關鍵。

sentences.english: This geographical shift has brought dramatic changes in style and substance.
sentences.chinese: 區位的改變造成了風格和重心的鉅變。

sentences.english: The Regional Science and related disciplines have long been concentrating on the location problem.
sentences.chinese: 區域科學及其相關學科對區位問題的關注由來已久。

sentences.english: This article has obtained from the behavior region theory, carrying on the discussion to the new region factor.
sentences.chinese: 從行爲區位理論入手，對新的區位因素進行了探討。

sentences.english: This article has obtained from the behavior region theory, carrying on the discussion to the new region factor.
sentences.chinese: 從行爲區位理論入手，對新的區位因素進行了探討。

sentences.english: How does the location factor influence the practical economy?
sentences.chinese: 區位因子是如何在實際經濟中發揮自己的影響力的？

sentences.english: Our company has its unique resource and region advantages in developing the project.
sentences.chinese: 本公司開發該項目具有獨特的資源優勢和區位優勢。

sentences.english: Has a geographical advantage and good investment environment.
sentences.chinese: 具有區位優勢和良好的投資環境。

sentences.english: Daming Mountain is located on the Tropic of Cancer and has its own positional characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 大明山位於北迴歸線上，具有其獨特的區位特徵。

definition: to do things each in one's own way
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
Yantian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
